content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the case involved a dispute between an applicant and a defendant but the details of the case are not provided both parties incurred legal fees with the defendant paying €32820 and an additional €2656 while the applicant paid €20000 in the final resolution the court decided that the defendant can keep an opel zafiraa car and the claimant will receive €200 in financial compensation the court also determined that a toyota yaris car belongs to the applicant and the defendant is not entitled to any compensation for it the court stated that the defendant is obligated to a third party in a joint several obligation and both parties must fulfill the terms of the credit agreement the text also discusses various aspects related to matrimonial property including the division of property and shares indivisible assets and deviation from equal shares the court ordered the dissolution of the marriage due to fault by the defendant and awarded nonmaterial damages and maintenance for their minor daughter to the applicant the court also addressed personal debt and promissory notes between the parties the court upheld the applicants fulfillment of the promissory note obligation and discharged the defendants obligation the court recognized the applicants ownership of a toyota yaris car based on evidence of a promissory note the costs of the proceedings were exempted for the applicant who received legal aid while the defendant was ordered to pay a portion of the costs the revised application was partially granted and the counterclaim was partially allowed the matrimonial property was divided with the defendant inheriting a car and the applicant keeping another car as their personal property the applicant was declared to have an obligation to a third party based on a credit agreement and the terms of the agreement will be altered due to the dissolution of the marriage the defendant was ordered to pay certain legal costs and the applicant was also ordered to pay the defendants legal costs

metadata.cost: 328.20 EUR (legal fees) + 26.56 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant 200.00 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the applicant
